title: Córdoba, Spain
summary: Córdoba (/ˈkɔːrdəbə/; Spanish: [ˈkoɾðoβa]),[lower-alpha 1] or Cordova (/ˈkɔːrdəvə/)[6][7] in English, is a city in Andalusia, southern Spain, and the capital of the province of Córdoba. It is the third most populated municipality in Andalusia, after Sevilla and Málaga, and the 11th overall in the country.
